content.title: La Ausencia en que Perduras (Book of poems - in Spanish)
content.description: "La Ausencia en que Perduras" (The Absence in Which You Endure) is a chronicle of the tacit fracturing of an unrequited love. It presents a constant and desperate distortion of language into melody. Each poem in this collection aspires to portray, with abstract precision, the archetypal sorrows of those loves that cannot be, that timeless presence of matters that simply are not. Although veiled in pronounced (albeit superficial) melancholy, this work preserves in its essence the insistent hope of a serene passage in which things do come to be.
